text: Motion
Motion

Producer-san,
Where should I put this?

Oh, I think the mats go in the storage room...
I'll come with you.

...You could have taken it easy until departure,
you know?

That's not okay.
We've relied on the camp's equipment a lot.

Not cleaning up
would be rude!

...Alright! Then,
let's get to work together...!
Hehe, Roger that!
...The camp went by in the blink of an eye.

It's probably because
we were so fulfilled.
Yeah! I think we did really well...
These shoes are starting to feel comfortable...
I aimed to wear them out with hard work.

Hehe...
I wonder if they'll get worn out~

Next time, I'll have to work hard
until they're worn out.

Until then, I'll make sure
to watch over them properly.
Hehe, thanks.

Even after the camp's over,
let's keep working together, Producer-san!
